constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 146 (Friday, August 13, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. WILSON of South Carolina:
H.R. 5039.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H4332]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Hizballah in Latin America Accountability Act of 2021
